root.name: Jetpac Refuelled
root.description: Gameplay Jetpac Refuelled maintains the originals classic 2D gameplay that sees players blasting their way through 128 levels, all of which feature new graphics in HD. There is also the option to play the 1983 original. Multiplayer Play co-operatively locally or on Xbox Live.Supports Leaderboards CollectablesNew Rocket SectionFuel PodLazer UpgradeEMPIsotopeGold Idol Original Rocket SectionFuel PodGemstoneMineralPlutoniumIsotopeGold Bar
